tests.name: DELIMITED in/out
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (dec DECIMAL(7,5)) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST;

tests.name: AVRO in/out
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (dec DECIMAL(7,5)) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST;

tests.name: JSON in/out
comments: JSON does not support DECIMAL yet - the integration with Connect would make it require
using awkward HEX strings to encode the bytes.
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (dec DECIMAL(7,5)) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST;

tests.name: addition
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (a DECIMAL(4,2), b DECIMAL(4,2)) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT (a + b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: addition 3 columns
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (a DECIMAL(4,2), b DECIMAL(4,2)) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT (a + a + b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: subtraction
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (a DECIMAL(4,2), b DECIMAL(4,2)) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT (a - b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: multiplication
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (a DECIMAL(4,2), b DECIMAL(4,2)) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT (a * b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;

tests.name: division
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (a DECIMAL(4,2), b DECIMAL(4,2)) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT (a / b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;
comments: The last record causes division by zero, the error is logged and a null value is output

tests.name: mod
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (a DECIMAL(4,2), b DECIMAL(4,2)) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT (a % b) AS RESULT FROM TEST;
comments: The last record causes modulo by zero, the error is logged and a null value is output
